name: Photopsia
description:
Photopsia is a tale of horror inspired by the phenomenon of, well, Photopsia, the stars you see when you get really dizzy. It's about Iris, and the strange adventures she experiences in her dreams.

The horror itself is yet to come. Technically it's already there though , heh.
This VN has no jumpscares, I like slow build-ups so the scares, once implemented, will be  slow too, it has a bit of a burn.

This is an early demo, the proper demo itself will be updated in 2-3 weeks, I think.  That version will be a lot better and have a lot more. This version is mainly here as a bit of a test run to test a few things I was worried about. I really like odd horror and strange tales, so I've always wanted to make something like this, so I made it for my graduation project.

The horror itself honestly still needs to come, technically it's already there though , heh.

This VN has no jumpscares, I like slow build-ups so the scares, once implemented, will be  slow too.

I hope you'll enjoy it!  If you have time please fill out the survey about the art BEFORE PLAYING over here:  https://goo.gl/forms/R5tCo7SzRZPHDIWQ2
And if you've finished playing please fill in this survey too, if you have time: 
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc2uW1eAUW47KK2iLteVvunv86SFKoJ-A6SpeYD...
